categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars Resistance

nodes.text: Dendro IV was a terrestrial astronomical object in the galaxy that appeared green from space. During the war between the First Order and the Resistance, the First Order attacked and bombarded Dendro IV, causing a region of its surface to become devastated and burned.

Dendro IV was originally created for the Star Wars Resistance episode "The Escape," released on January 26, 2020, in which it would appear in the opening sequence. In a later draft, the world attacked by the First Order was changed to Aeos Prime, which harbored the Resistance in the prior episode "The New World," to more effectively show the consequences of the First Order's actions.

Despite the fact that Dendro IV did not appear in the final product, it was mentioned in the "Bucket's List" article for Part 1 of "The Escape," published on StarWars.com on January 27, 2020, and concept art of a devastated world created by Jim Moore was published on the episode guide for the episode's second part. While the caption identified the image as being of Aeos, the world depicted appears different to the ocean planet, and is labeled "planetballDendroDstrd."
